column4: hey.. how to run irc from ubuntu live cd 8.10 ?? i want to talk with you guys.. from ubuntu..
pidgin is already installed in the live cd and will act like an irc client.. kinda funky but works.. you can also install irssi for cli .. it'll go away on reboot but works great
sorry It's been 2 years since I've used pidgin for irc. it works but the how to is beyond me
